mapper.select:
select
distinct
from venta
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into venta (IDDOCUMENTO, NUMVENTA, IDCLIENTE, FECVENTA, FECENTREGA, FECPAGO, ESTADO, MONVENTA, MONDESCUENTO, MONADELANTO, MONIGV, FECREGISTRO, FECMODIFICACION) values (#{iddocumento,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numventa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcliente,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fecventa,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fecentrega,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fecpago,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{estado,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{monventa,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mondescuento,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{monadelanto,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{monigv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fecregistro,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fecmodificacion,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update venta
IDDOCUMENTO = #{record.iddocumento,jdbcType=INTEGER},

FECVENTA = #{record.fecventa,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
